summary: An Argonian with Dragon abilities (Sorry no flight this time)
descriptionHtml:
This is an Argonian with ten breath weapons and many immunities.

Please download an use Locational Damage:

http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12615/?

as this removes the Overpoweredness of the race. I got killed with a single head shot, it was AWESOME.

Just download and enjoy.

You don't need anything but vanilla Skyrim, but I do HIGHLY RECOMEND the Locational Damage Mod.
author: Jason Mackinnon
